name: Red-Hawk
description:
GM48 Game-Jam Version

Dodge crazy amounts of bullets, Defeat Tough foes, 

and Collect as many points as you can to get the HIGH SCORE! 

A Mysterious Army has invaded the earth, and you where in the right place at the wrong time.

now its up to you to defeat the invaders and save earth!

⌨️Controls:🎮

⌨️Keyboard  main⌨️Keyboard  Alt🎮GamePad  Action⌨️Arrow Keys ⌨️ WASD🎮 Left stickMove/Select⌨️Z  ⌨️ J 🎮AShoot/Confirm⌨️C ⌨️L🎮B Bomb/Cancel⌨️X ⌨️K🎮X  Precision Mode⌨️Ctrl ⌨️Ctrl 🎮Left trigger Fast Text⌨️ESC ⌨️ Enter🎮StartPause & options

Change Log:

5/26/22: Fixed leader board not showing all entries.
